name: Atlanticus Holdings Corporation
description: Atlanticus Holdings Corporation is a financial services company that provides innovative credit and payment solutions to underserved markets. Founded in 1996 and headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, Atlanticus specializes in consumer finance and offers a range of products including credit cards, personal loans, and point-of-sale financing options. The company focuses on helping consumers who may not have access to traditional credit solutions by leveraging technology to enhance the customer experience. Atlanticus operates through various subsidiaries and partners with retailers and service providers to deliver flexible financing options that meet the needs of consumers. The company is dedicated to financial inclusion and strives to create opportunities for individuals to obtain credit and improve their financial well-being. With a strong emphasis on customer service and technology-driven solutions, Atlanticus is well-positioned in the evolving landscape of financial services. The company's mission is to empower consumers through accessible credit solutions that promote financial literacy and responsible borrowing.
